translations: n.参考书目，文献目录；目录学，文献学

sentences.sentence: Listing 2 shows a sample XML document, bib.xml, which represents a bibliography of books.
sentences.translation: 清单 2 显示了一个示例 XML 文档 bib.xml ，它表示书籍的书目。

sentences.sentence: The Three Rules is a self-conscious contribution to this type of writing; it even includes a bibliography of "success studies".
sentences.translation: 《三条规则》是对这类写作的自觉贡献；它甚至包括“成功研究”的参考书目。

sentences.sentence: At the end of this chapter there is a select bibliography of useful books.
sentences.translation: 本章末尾附着有用书籍的精选书目。
